Container.Name: pushbullet_ytdl
Container.Overview:
PushBullet-YTDL is a lightweight pure bash service for YouTube-dl and Pushbullet. PushBullet-YTDL uses Youtube-DL Material by Tzahi12345 as the API endpoint to send YouTube-dl requests to and leverages the public Pushbullet API to listen for download requests.
Features Register a device to a given Pushbullet account. Listen for pushes to the device registered. Extract the URL to the desired download. Send a download request to Youtube-DL Material via its internal API. Delete a push after it has been successfully downloaded. Usage To use simply share a video from the source app (e.g. YouTube app) on your phone to the PushBullet device running PushBullet-YTDL.

Config.Name: Pushbullet API Key
Config.Description: Enter the API key for Pushbullet. Go to https://www.pushbullet.com/#settings/account to retrieve your API key/access token

Config.Name: YouTube-DL-Material URL
Config.Description: URL + Port for YouTube-DL-Material. If HTTP: include http://ip:port if HTTPS: include https://domain

Config.Name: Sleep Time
Config.Description: Change sleep delay between calls (Push bullet free account only allows 500 API calls per month. Default is 60 seconds
